<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2872</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Good Citizen Program</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gutes Bürger-Programm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bon Programme de Citoyen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programa Bom Do Cidadão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Buon Programma Del Cittadino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλό πρόγραμμα πολιτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Buen Programa Del Ciudadano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a group activity wherestudents discuss and choose a project to help needy people in their community. They produce a written explanation and reasons for their choice and its expected. contribution to the community. Includes assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">community</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">project</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Gruppe Aktivität 
wherestudents behandeln und beschließen ein Projekt, um bedürftigen 
Leuten in ihrer Gemeinschaft zu helfen. Sie produzieren eine 
schriftliche Erklärung und Gründe für ihre Wahl und seinen 
erwarteten Beitrag zur Gemeinschaft. Enthält Einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour des wherestudents d'une 
activité de groupe discutent et choisissent un projet pour aider les 
personnes indigentes dans leur communauté. Elles produisent une
explication écrite et des raisons de leur choix et de sa contribution
prévue à la communauté. Inclut la rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para wherestudents de uma 
atividade do grupo discute e escolhe um projeto ajudar a povos needy 
em sua comunidade. Produzem uma explanação escrita e razões 
para sua escolha e sua contribuição prevista à comunidade. 
Inclui o rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per i wherestudents di 
attività del gruppo discute e sceglie un progetto per aiutare la 
gente needy nella loro Comunità. Produce una spiegazione 
scritta ed i motivi per la loro scelta ed il relativo contributo 
previsto alla Comunità. Include la rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα ομάδας 
wherestudents συζητά και επιλέγει ένα πρόγραμμα για να 
ενισχυθούν οι ενδεείς άνθρωποι στην κοινότητά τους. 
Παράγουν μια γραπτή εξήγηση και τους λόγους για την επιλογή
τους και την αναμενόμενη συμβολή του στην κοινότητα. 
Περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para los wherestudents de 
una actividad del grupo discute y elige un proyecto para ayudar a la 
gente needy en su comunidad. Ella produce una explicación 
escrita y las razones de su opción y de su contribución prevista a 
la comunidad. Incluye la rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gemeinschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la communauté</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
